main: ^Atlas: You say it’s of the god of fun.
^Atlas: But it keeps people from having fun, it keeps people from playing in the ballpit, it pushes people apart.
^Atlas: This artefact, it’s a curse, bringing out the worst in you all.
^Atlas: Making those who own it so obsessed with keeping it that they’d sacrifice their fellow kid for it.
^Atlas: And those who don’t so obsessed with getting it that they’re willing to do anything just to get their hands on it.
^Atlas: Well, now this bottle shall belong to no one.
^Atlas: No one but the ballpit it resides in and anyone who wants to play and have fun.
